attributes.name: usePredefinedCurve
attributes.description: Use predefined SN-curve from selected standard

attributes.name: negativeInverseSlope
attributes.description: Negative inverse slope of the segment (first segment if several segments are given, or total curve if no more are given)

attributes.name: interceptStress
attributes.description: Stress range resulting in failure after one cycle

attributes.name: referenceThicknessFactor
attributes.description: t/t_ref:  where t is thickness through which a crack will most likely grow and t_ref i reference thickness

attributes.name: fatigueLimitStress
attributes.description: Stress range level for which the SN curve becomes horizontal.

attributes.name: fatigueLimitCycles
attributes.description: Logarithm of number of stress cycles for which the SN curve becomes horizontal.
